explains: adj. 整体的；巨石的，庞大的；完全统一的
n. 单块集成电路，单片电路
wordGroup: monolithic integrated circuit n. 单片硅积体电路
monolithic structure n. 整体结构；单片结构；独石结构
monolithic integration 单片集成电路

sentences.en: Don't think this gang is monolithic — it can be split up.
sentences.cn: 不要以为这帮人是铁板一块，他们是可以分化的。

sentences.en: Evidence such as this serves to undermine the apparently monolithic edifice of Victorianism.
sentences.cn: 这样的证据破坏了维多利亚时代看似单一的建筑。

sentences.en: Cuban-Americans no longer form a monolithic block.
sentences.cn: 美籍古巴人不再构成一个大的阻碍。
